ReferenceDocuments.name: LBCAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology. This would most commonly be either a heading, or a pre-printed category value on the CRF and not a question to which the site would provide an answer. If a question is asked, the response would typically be a sponsor-defined codelist. If the form is laid out as a grid, then words such as "Category" can be included as the column header. Laboratory tests have commonly recognized categories and subcategories that should be used whenever appropriate. LBCAT and or LBSCAT should be included if lab status (NOT DONE) is collected for each lab category/subcategory (e.g., HEMATOLOGY, CHEMISTRY, URINALYSIS).

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-11 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. 8-16-18 Created as part of the CDISC mapping task; tt.
